basic_information.scholarship_name: Louis D. Nagi Endowed Memorial Scholarship

description: The Louis D. Nagi Endowed Memorial Scholarship is open to a graduate student in the MBA Program. The student must be a U.S. citizen with a minimum 3.5 cumulative GPA. Preference to be given to U.S. student in the MBA Program who plans to go into the teaching field. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student in the MBA Program Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher U.S. Citizen Selection Process Preference to be given to U.S. student in the MBA Program who plans to go into the teaching field

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
